entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 reaches next step in deprecation of `BinaryFormatter` #284
  • Static Web Assets Compression Flag Breaking Change #283

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NET 6.0 - mutual TLS with private key stored in TPM2 (as a client certificate) #94493
  • [7.0] Assertion failed in System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests in ThreadPoolBoundHandle.BindHandleCore in ThreadPoolBoundHandle.Windows.cs:line 14 #94491
    7.0.x
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] VTable initialization failure for class implementing an interface #94490
    8.0.x
  • [mono][reflection] ArgumentNullException calling `GetCustomAttributes` on user-defined subtype of `ParameterInfo` #94488
    8.0.x
  • [browser][MT] CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource #94486
    9.0.0
  • Make it easy to determine entry assembly path when debugging CoreCLR #94474
    9.0.0
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization][tracking] Regressions of text APIs when running in *HybridGlobalization* mode. #94473
  • Usability Issues in HttpClient #94471
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method in a sealed class #94467
    9.0.0
  • `ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory` causes faulty permissions with pinned files #94465
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 9.0 #94464
  • ILLink: ArgumentException in Cecil metadata reader during marking #94457
  • `ZipArchive` in `Update` mode loads whole ZIP file into memory #94455
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 11/4/2023 4:52:33 AM #94476
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 11/2/2023 12:57:39 AM #94475
  • Regressions in System.Perf_Convert #94477
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #94479
  • Fold handle + offset into a single instruction if possible #94448
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: LoongArch64: add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64 #94445

Closed

  • Add publish option for NativeAOT to produce .lib file for shared libs #94480
  • Exception occurs while deserializing a System.RunTimeType Property #80590
    Future
  • [browser] Rollup removes `webpackIgnore` comments in release builds #92888
    9.0.0
  • Trying to save application settings crashes the application. #93671
    Future
  • HttpClient - error An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #93276
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Null ref in type reference walker during marking #94458
  • DEREF_OF_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/lsrabuild.cpp #93048
    9.0.0
  • Custom converters for enum dictionary keys not working as expected #94452
  • [API Proposal]: new constructor ReadOnlySequence(IEnumerable<ReadOnlyMemory<T>>) #94341
  • [WASM] DotnetHostBuilder withDebugging does not accept a value of 0 #94238
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Can't import native functions with 64bit parameters when using mono_add_internal_call #90786
    9.0.0
  • Use of `ref readonly` instead of `in` in libraries is a breaking change for F# callers #94317
  • Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #93876
    9.0.0
  • [Experiment] Modernization of Locks #78202
    Future
  • why not preinstall .net runtime in windows10+ #94447
  • Blazor WASM NET 6.0 app fail to build with NET8 RC2 SDK under Framework #94379
    8.0.x
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #94300

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typos in XML comments on XxHash128 #94495
    area-System.IO
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94494
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ElapsedEventArgs: public constructor + sealed #94489
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • update Alpine test images #94487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #94485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #94484
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94478
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Introduce VectorXXX.CountMatches and VectorXXX.IndexOfMatch helper methods to ensure optimal codegen for ARM64 and unrolled fallback paths #94472
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94469
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94468
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.16
  • [browser][MT] more testing and cleanup #94466
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Implement SOS related Debugger API code. #94454
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix Comvariant Failure on s390x #94453
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Disallow inlining Main #94449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #94482
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #94483
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] keep webpackIgnore #94460
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Do not release frozen segment if we failed extending it #94450
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add option for R2R configured runs. #94412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94451
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Add file handle limit setting for Alpine #94439
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove dead GT_NOP code in LSRA #94409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. (#94267) #94307
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [browser] allow zero as debug level #94456
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost: Fix passing message as paramName #94389
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix HEAP* deprecation messages #94442
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix stale memory on suspended thread #94299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix `EvalHWIntrinsicFunBinary` for ARM `MultiplyByScalar` #94413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94438
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug, 8.0.x
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94437
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94401
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94402
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use correct native type in test marshallers #93432
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add `repeatCount` in superpmi.exe to repeat the compilation of 1 or more methods #93417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Fix GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte_Vector not taken on ARM64 #90527
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add document listing supported feature checks #94440
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add printing full type name of nested types for ilverify output #94441
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Make Deflate/GZip/ZlibStream empty writes have the same impact as no writes #94433
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Expose ChannelReader.ReadAllAsync from non-core builds as well #94417
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch doesn't launch browser correctly if the listening URL has a trailing slash #36709
  • [Bug]: getItem/getProperty output can contain unrelated junk #36694

Closed

  • New/Empty Blazor Server Project from template doesn't compile (.Net 6 preview 7) #19652
  • net 6.0 throws NETSDK1005 error during build/publish via cmd as it does not accept the property "TargetFramework(s)" #19628
  • BlazorAOT workload installation not working #19798
  • Unable to find a stable package Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Authoring.Tasks with version (>= 8.0.100) #36659

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #36718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #36717
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36716
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #36715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36714
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #36713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2309986 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36676
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.2

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.101 #36706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.405 #36705
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.312 #36704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.115 #36703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.418 #36702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.321 #36701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.126 #36700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler (#35939) #36670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old System.CommandLine code that has a more natural expression #36672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [Issue #35173] WIP: `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove IDE0055 (formatting) pragma suppressions for collection literals #70711
  • "pascal_case" on field is only enforced when the first character is not already uppercase #70709
  • Collection expressions: invalid code generated for inline array spread element #70708

Closed

  • Follow-up changes for VS workspace LSP pull diagnostic requests #70703
    17.10
  • Primary constructors fixer creates invalid code around nested class constructor parameters #70586
    17.9
  • Apply-all with IDE0290 (use primary constructor) is failing #70658
  • Roslyn tries to override inherited methods from a record in a class #70530
  • Generate Method inside a static lambda should generate a static method #70565
    17.9
  • Reenable IDE0055 #70705
  • Warning suppressors should run insofar as not all errors are unsuppressible #62540
    17.9
  • Deprecate syntax serialization logic. #70275
    17.9
  • MoveToNamespace doesn't work for records #48315
    Backlog
  • CS0103 error on SDK 6.0.416 #70713

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Wait for compilation to be available during test setup #70722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific error for spread with no GetEnumerator() method #70717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove the old integration test projects #70716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix for source generator diagnostics not showing up as part of live analysis when generators run in OOP #70715
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Align VS workspace diagnostics with public spec by keeping request open until the workspace changes #70710
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix mispelling of type name #70721
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with 'implement abstract class' and records #70720
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'generate method' within static lambdas/local-functions #70719
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'Use primary constructor' #70718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve Hover markdown on 'await' keyword #70629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update CodeStyle analyzer and MicrosoftNetCompilersToolset packages #70712
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, Next
  • Remove syntax serialization logic. #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • WIP - Demonstrate removing syntax reading/writing from streams. #70274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Tweak spell checking spans #70706
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only change documents in solution #70669
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70688
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improving type-safety of RazorComponentResult<T> #51923
  • Static Web Assets Compression Flag Breaking Change #51922
  • Dotnet watch run broken with arguments #51921
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapivanilla #51920
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext #51919
  • Add a simple TooManyRequestsResult to provided action object results #51915
  • ASP.NET Core Web App (Model-View-Controller) targeting .NET 8 with Windows Identity Platform fails after user login #51913
  • Add option to disable form field as CSRF token source from `AntiforgeryOptions` #51912
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla #51908

Closed

  • Blazor WASM: Button-tag is not correctly disabled within a disabled fieldset #34749
    Planning: WebUI
  • PageTitle not working in Auth default template page #51739
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #51899
  • CodeSpace fails to build Dotnet #51848
  • get InvalidCastException when I use [Inject]IAccessTokenProvider #51699

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #51918
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #51917
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #51916
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update build docs and AspNetCore.sln #51900
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 23556.1 #51907
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51762
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #51880
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, analyzer, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #51881
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #51728
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump not working when process run as user #4375
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [RISC-V] Implement SOS related code. #4385

Merged

  • Fix DumpStackObjects <bounds> error #4384

Updated

  • format timestamps so they are universally readable #4371

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [BUG] 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk.iOS.Manifest-7.0.100 16.4.7125' has incompatible package type. #18604
  • BoxView will not render on iOS if it's parent is not visible when the page is built, but is made visible afterwards. #18587
  • Events should be triggered on iOS #18582
  • Compile error multilanguage app upgrade existing project to .net 8 (visual studio preview version 6) #18576
  • [Android] .NET 8 TabBar Title is bold vs .NET 7 TabBar which is not bold #18574
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI SR9 7.0.100 breaks iOS build #18573
  • [iOS] canvas.GetStringSize() not considering newlines #18572
  • MS Store upload: Package acceptance validation error #18571
  • Android: Pinch gesture not working properly in Carousel #18569
    .NET 8 SR1
  • .NET 7: Can't add a ListView to a grid position if the column's with is "auto" #18563
  • [MAUI]Enlarge My recipes page and then zoom out, the pictures will be arranged vertically. #18559
    .NET 8 SR1
  • TabbedPage with ToolbarPlacement = Bottom: SelectedTabColor does not move highlight to correct tab if the tab is changed programmatically #18558
    Backlog
  • [iOS] BindableLayout or a CollectionView in a CollectionView display bug #18557
  • Localization of MenuBarItem on Android not working #18556
  • Whole App Shell and Shell content disapear when changing between tabs fast enough (Release mode on Android) #18555

Closed

  • Shapes without handlers shouldn't be added as LogicalChildren #16919
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Maui Popup Randomly Disrupts the Transitional View #18474
  • [MacOSX][Label] Label won't display text in italic #15912
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException: Unable to instantiate activity #18523
  • Entry stays under the Keyboard when focused on iOS on .Net 8 #18564
  • [iOS] Updating the text of a label destroys the ScrollView layout #18496
    .NET 8 SR1
  • MAUI Templates not found after install #18232
  • Couldn't install or uninstall AndroidTools_Xamarin #18358
  • Error #18357
  • [MAUI] Ugly picture with MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync on macOS #17481
  • iOS SearchBar Unfocused Event not fired, Keyboard not disappearing. #18369
  • Date not formatted correctly on iPhone device #18527

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Move MAUI Blazor template files to match ASP.NET Blazor template #18608
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18605
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `ImageButton` #18602
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.3 to 3.14.0 #18601
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PropertyValues.SetValues does not include JSON Column properties #32246

Closed

  • [PostgreSQL] Using enum types in composite key #32245

PullRequests

Created

  • Scaffolding: Handle unknown computed column SQL in model factory #32251
  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #32250
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #32249
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #32248

Updated

  • Temporal table migrations refactor. #32239
  • Make ModelBuilderTest asserts more robust and extensible #32221
    providers-beware
